title: Ted Meyer
text:
Edward "Ted" Arthur Meyer (27 January 1907 – 5 June 1981) was a New Zealand professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1930s. He played at representative level for <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand</a> (<a href="List%20of%20New%20Zealand%20Kiwis%20representatives">Heritage № 210</a>), and <a href="Northland%20rugby%20league%20team">Northland</a>, as a , i.e. number 6.
International honours.
Meyer represented <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand</a> in 1930 against <a href="Australia%20rugby%20league%20team">Australia</a>.
